title: Peru
subtitle: Trek the Inca Trail to Machu Picchu
short_description: Trek the legendary Inca Trail to Machu Picchu. Witness a magnificent sunrise over this spectacular wonder of the world. Wander down cobblestone streets in ancient Cuzco, and explore colorful markets and ruins in Pisac and Ollantaytambo. Be amazed by cloud forests, canyons, and snow-capped peaks. See FAQ for dates!
accommodations: Shared hotel room and tent camping
